column5: wondering what clubs circuits ect have bass tournament in the kawarthas.  familiar with top bass and cfl but wondered what other options might be there
Bassmaster and CBAF have club tourneys usually  5-50 boats
plus you have things like the emerald isle tournie and other "one off" tournies....  and some of them are quite big!
plus you have things like the emerald isle tournie and other "one off" tournies....  and some of them are quite big! where would i find these listed when the time comes
bigfatbass is a good resource when it comes to most things bass fishing...including tournaments.
Peterborough bassmasters has run a tourney on the Sunday of opening weekend the last two years out of Golden Beach resort on Rice Lake.  It may be returning in 2015 so stay tuned.

The Emerald Island Bass Tournament is full every year, with most anglers returning and paying by a set date. I would call the Emerald Island Marina and have your name put on the waiting list if your are interested. $250 entry fee for a two day tournament. There is also the Stoney Lake Tournament the weekend after the Emerald Island one.
